attributes.action: Allow seriously sick children the chance of treatment outside of the UK
attributes.background: Theres been several cases where children's lives are being ended without family agreeing. We believe if the UK have no answers we as parents deserve to take out children outside of the UK for treatmemt. Where this fails children should pass away where the parents decide. We demand parental rights.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
